definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

pinyin: ji3 zhui1 zhi3 ya1 zhi4 liao2 shi1
ji3 zhui1 zhi3 ya1 zhi4 liao2 yi1 sheng1
ji3 zhui1 zhi3 ya1 liao2 fa3

sentences.english: Available massage methods by kneading finger press knocking.
sentences.chinese: 具有揉捏指压捶打等按摩方式。

sentences.english: The branch devoted to the use of pressure points to restore energy flow is called the practice of acupressure.
sentences.chinese: 这种着重于以按穴恢复能量脉流的分支就是指压按摩。

sentences.english: Electrostatic Acupressure adds a slight electrical shock to acupressure administrations.
sentences.chinese: 静电指压增加了一个轻微的电击除颤，按摩主管部门。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese massage is different from Shiatsu . People who practice Shiatsu just press your acupoints.
sentences.chinese: 推拿和指压不太一样，指压师只会按压你的穴道。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese massage is different from Shiatsu . People who practice Shiatsu just press your acupoints.
sentences.chinese: 推拿和指压不太一样，指压师只会按压你的穴道。

sentences.english: Purpose:To analyze the significance of finger-pressing therapy at acupoints in bronchofibroscopic check.
sentences.chinese: 探讨穴位指压法在纤支镜检查中的意义。

sentences.english: Remove eye wrinkles and then refers to the pressure of "Tong Zi Liao. ""
sentences.chinese: 再指压除去眼角皱纹的“瞳子髎”。

sentences.english: Acupressure is manual pressure applied to a specific slightly depressed point on the body.
sentences.chinese: 指压按摩是用手按压人体某个轻微凹陷的穴位。

sentences.english: After a long day at the range you relax by visiting the chiropractor.
sentences.chinese: 行军一整天后，你看脊椎指压治疗师来放松。

sentences.english: Acupressure can be used to treat diabetes by stimulating the point that lies one thumb's width below the belly button.
sentences.chinese: 指压，可用于治疗由点在于刺激脐下一拇指宽糖尿病。

sentences.english: Do you want a shiatsu massage or an oil massage?
sentences.chinese: 你要指压按摩还是精油按摩？

sentences.english: You can also enjoy a Shiatsu massage.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以享受指压按摩。

sentences.english: These methods assume that means the pressure method and the use of collaboration, the effect is higher.
sentences.chinese: 假设这些方法和指压法协作运用，效果更高。

sentences.english: Body and face massage with essential oils, volcanic stones and shiatsu.
sentences.chinese: 身体和脸部用精油，火山石头和指压按摩。

definition: Quchi acupoint LI11, at the lateral end of the elbow crease
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
body palpation (diagnostic method in TCM)/tactile examination
